segments.text: I see the girl standing near the boy, her arm raised and palm open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes the danger her brother is in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be cooperating with him, which is not a good idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how attentive her posture is, completely focused on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she might be too young to understand the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't encourage him to reach further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy struggling to balance on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman needs to intervene before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
